What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Pregnancy&Parenting > Teen&Preteen > Resolved Question Eden Member since: September 09, 2010 Total points: 2,333 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » How can a 15 year old make money fast? in the UK 11 months ago Report Abuse by Rachel Carleton Member since: July 01, 2011 Total points: 737 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker basically, get a job! sole trader shops, ie like, take two shops around where you live. sayy, Asda, and the corner shop called"Annies little shop"asda, has supermarkets everywhere, this isn't a sole trading business. but Annies Little Shop, has only one store, that is a sole trader. you can ask for a job in there.
just ask around, leave your phone number, name, age, and anything else they ask for. obviously dont leave your address for safety reasons Lol
i started working in a local bakery, when i was 15, been working there a year now :D earned myself a tidy amount of just over a thousand pounds.
it takes time, unless youre some child genius hehe :) Source(s): myself! 11 months ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: Thanks :) Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
